name: Mission Arts Center
description: Features - Auditorium - Available for Rentals - Ceramics Studio - Community Room(s) - Dance Studio - Playground - Restrooms Located in the heart of San Francisco’s Mission District, Mission Arts Center is home to some of the city’s finest dance, theater, ceramics and visual arts classes, as well as a budding culinary program. In addition to classrooms, this beautiful brick building contains a dance studio, an auditorium, and a newly-updated ceramics studio. Visit Class Schedule for current and u
